title: Dual monitor/similar set up for customer service desk?
description: So I’m working on setting up a new customer service desk. Our old computer set up doesn’t work.

title: Three tips for how to keep your computer safe
description: Step 1 - Invest in a good anti-virus. Step 2 - Use unique passwords.  Step 3 - Use two-factor authentication.

title: Alternatives to Spotify?
description: Does anyone have any recommendations for Spotify alternatives? I'm taking a page out of Neil Young's book and looking at cancelling my Spotify premium account.

title: Best laptops for kid wanting to play simple online games
description: I'm looking for advice on getting a good laptop that my daughter can use to play online and downloadable games. Please don't judge the choice of games, she is developmentally delayed and I don't need her to be using games that may offer in game purchases.

title: Besides gaming or work, what are some things you use your computer for that makes you think, 'I am getting my money's worth'?
description: Just looking for some ideas. I figured this would be the best place to ask this question. Or is there a better one?
